description: Runs a job, using a transformer, to parse input EDI (electronic data interchange) file into the output structures used by Amazon Web Services B2B Data Interchange. If you only want to transform EDI (electronic data interchange) documents, you don't need to create profiles, partnerships or capabilities. Just create and configure a transformer, and then run the StartTransformerJob API to process your files.

parameters.name: inputFile
parameters.description: Specifies the location of the input file for the transformation. The location consists of an Amazon S3 bucket and prefix. bucketName (string) --- Specifies the name of the Amazon S3 bucket. key (string) --- Specifies the Amazon S3 key for the file location.

nested_params.name: bucketName
nested_params.description: Specifies the name of the Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_params.name: key
nested_params.description: Specifies the Amazon S3 key for the file location.

parameters.name: outputLocation
parameters.description: Specifies the location of the output file for the transformation. The location consists of an Amazon S3 bucket and prefix. bucketName (string) --- Specifies the name of the Amazon S3 bucket. key (string) --- Specifies the Amazon S3 key for the file location.

nested_params.name: bucketName
nested_params.description: Specifies the name of the Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_params.name: key
nested_params.description: Specifies the Amazon S3 key for the file location.

parameters.name: transformerId
parameters.description: Specifies the system-assigned unique identifier for the transformer.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: Reserved for future use. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: transformerJobId
nested_items.description: Returns the unique, system-generated identifier for a transformer run.
